text: @realDonaldTrump Incredible you are thrashing, trashing about, tweeting out campaign ads,tossing & turning, stewing in your own putrid filthabout fake news,who to blame, how victimized you are at night when it should be the rate of COVID-19 deaths keeping the you awake in the middle of the night.
